text:
Ewan Gordon McGregor (born 31 March 1971) is a Scottish actor who has had a lot of success in both mainstream and indie movies. He is ranked #36 in Empire magazine's "The Top 100 Movie Stars of All Time" list. He is perhaps best known for playing the lead role in Danny Boyle's "Trainspotting", his portrayal of Obi-Wan Kenobi in the prequel trilogy of "Star Wars", and his motorcycle adventures with friend Charley Boorman.
McGregor starred as Christopher in the 2018 Disney movie "Christopher Robin". He will star as the villain Black Mask in the 2020 DCEU movie "Birds of Prey".
